page.title: 14FARMERS' CALENDAR
page.content: {JANUARY:}Feed animals and clear farmyard.{FEBRUARY:}Hedging, ditching and clearing drains.{MARCH:}Fertilize fields and chain harrow fields.{APRIL: Roll fields.Cows come out to graze after staying in the farmyard all winter.{MAY:}Heifers and big calves go to graze.Nearer the end of May people start silaging.People plant root crops.{JUNE:}Finish silaging. Fertilise fields.Start hay making. {JULY:}Finish haymaking.Copsing.Start corn harvesting.{AUGUST:}We do a second silaging.We clear slurry lagoon.{SEPTEMBER:}Plough fields that had crops in and plant grass.{OCTOBER Cut hedges with a trimmer.People put in a Winter wheat.{NOVEMBER:}Cows come into farmyard for the winter and eat silage and hay.Some of the cows have calves.{DECEMBER:}Service machinery for next year.CLear up farmyard.
